Command.Name: Clone Nvmem To Opposite Bank
Command.Description: Support of NVMEM cloning/translation for firmware download

Variable.Name: NVMEM bank
Variable.Description: Where to read from /write to in NVMEM

DisabledCommand.Name: Commit NVMEM Image From Diagnostic Buffer
DisabledCommand.Description: A process to write the NVMEM image from the buffer to a NVMEM bank. What and where to write must be spelled out in the header of the buffer

DisabledCommand.Name: Read NVMEM To Diagnostic Buffer
DisabledCommand.Description: Start a process to commit diagnostic buffer as NVMEM image.

Command.Name: Enable External Writes To Diagnostic Buffer
Command.Description: Just a dummy process to lock out other buffer clients.\nTo unlock, cancel the process, however, the intended use is to leave the process running and force replace it with Commit.

Command.Name: External Write To Diagnostic Buffer
Command.Description: If external writes are not enabled, the command will be rejected\nThe command is non-compliant (doesn't return the values). So what?
